name: Weddings
short_description: Elegant and memorable weddings tailored to your dreams.
service_details: Our wedding services include venue selection, decor, catering, entertainment, and more. We ensure your special day is stress-free and unforgettable.

name: Birthday Parties
short_description: Fun-filled birthday celebrations for all ages.
service_details: We plan and execute birthday parties with themes, decorations, entertainment, and delicious cakes. Let us make your birthday a blast!

name: Engagement Parties
short_description: Joyous engagement parties for the newly engaged couple.
service_details: Our engagement party services include venue selection, decorations, engagement photo sessions, and more. Start your journey to forever with style.

name: Anniversaries
service_details: Celebrate your love with our anniversary services, featuring romantic venues, candlelit dinners, and personalized touches to make your day unforgettable.

name: Retirement Parties
short_description: Farewell celebrations for a well-deserved retirement.
service_details: Honor the retiree with a memorable party. We handle venue setup, speeches, entertainment, and everything you need to bid farewell in style.

name: Baby Shower
short_description: Sweet and welcoming baby showers for expecting parents.
service_details: We plan baby showers with cute themes, decorations, baby games, and refreshments. Create lasting memories as you welcome your new addition.
